• Main Page
Configuration
BMA400

Configuration API of sensor.

bma400_set_power_mode

int8_t bma400_set_power_mode(uint8_t power_mode, const struct bma400_dev *dev);
This API is used to set the power mode of the sensor.
Parameters
[in]power_mode: Macro to select power mode of the sensor.
[in]dev: Structure instance of bma400_dev.

Possible value for power_mode :

BMA400_NORMAL_MODE
BMA400_SLEEP_MODE
BMA400_LOW_POWER_MODE
Returns
Result of API execution status.
Return values
ZeroSuccess
PostiveWarning
NegativeError

bma400_get_power_mode

int8_t bma400_get_power_mode(uint8_t *power_mode, const struct bma400_dev *dev);
This API is used to get the power mode of the sensor.

Parameters
[out]power_mode: power mode of the sensor.
[in]dev: Structure instance of bma400_dev.
  • Possible value for power_mode :
    BMA400_NORMAL_MODE
    BMA400_SLEEP_MODE
    BMA400_LOW_POWER_MODE
Returns
Result of API execution status.
Return values
ZeroSuccess
PostiveWarning
NegativeError

bma400_set_sensor_conf

int8_t bma400_set_sensor_conf(const struct bma400_sensor_conf *conf, uint16_t n_sett,
const struct bma400_dev *dev);
This API is used to define sensor settings such as:

  • Accelerometer configuration (Like ODR,OSR,range...)
  • Tap configuration
  • Activity change configuration
  • Gen1/Gen2 configuration
  • Orientation change configuration
  • Step counter configuration
Parameters
[in]conf: Structure instance of the configuration structure
[in]n_sett: Number of settings to be set
[in]dev: Structure instance of bma400_dev
Note
Before calling this API, fill in the value of the required configurations in the conf structure (Examples are mentioned in the readme.md).
Returns
Result of API execution status.
Return values
ZeroSuccess
PostiveWarning
NegativeError

bma400_get_sensor_conf

int8_t bma400_get_sensor_conf(struct bma400_sensor_conf *conf, uint16_t n_sett, const struct bma400_dev *dev);
This API is used to get the sensor settings like sensor configurations and interrupt configurations and store them in the corresponding structure instance.
Parameters
[in]conf: Structure instance of the configuration structure
[in]n_sett: Number of settings to be obtained
[in]dev: Structure instance of bma400_dev.
Note
Once the API is called, the settings structure will be updated in the settings structure.
Returns
Result of API execution status.
Return values
ZeroSuccess
PostiveWarning
NegativeError

bma400_set_device_conf

int8_t bma400_set_device_conf(const struct bma400_device_conf *conf, uint8_t n_sett,
const struct bma400_dev *dev);
This API is used to set the device specific settings like:

  • BMA400_AUTOWAKEUP_TIMEOUT
  • BMA400_AUTOWAKEUP_INT
  • BMA400_AUTO_LOW_POWER
  • BMA400_INT_PIN_CONF
  • BMA400_INT_OVERRUN_CONF
  • BMA400_FIFO_CONF
Parameters
[in]conf: Structure instance of the configuration structure.
[in]n_sett: Number of settings to be set
[in]dev: Structure instance of bma400_dev.
Note
Before calling this API, fill in the value of the required configurations in the conf structure(refer Examples).
Returns
Result of API execution status.
Return values
ZeroSuccess
PostiveWarning
NegativeError

bma400_get_device_conf

int8_t bma400_get_device_conf(struct bma400_device_conf *conf, uint8_t n_sett, const struct bma400_dev *dev);
This API is used to get the device specific settings and store them in the corresponding structure instance.
Parameters
[in]conf: Structure instance of the configuration structure
[in]n_sett: Number of settings to be obtained
[in]dev: Structure instance of bma400_dev.
Note
Once the API is called, the settings structure will be updated in the settings structure.
Returns
Result of API execution status.
Return values
ZeroSuccess
PostiveWarning
NegativeError
